text: Help Yourself is the debut album by soul-blues singer Peggy Scott-Adams released in 1997. The records peaked at No. 72 of Billboard 200, and it includes the hit single "Bill". Other hits include "I'll Take Care of You", "Slow Drag", "I'm Getting What I Want", and the title track. == Track listing == == Personnel == *Jimmy Lewis - arranged by, background vocals, producer *Peggy Scott-Adams - vocals *Rich Cason - arranged by, engineer, keyboards == References == == External links == * * Category:1997 debut albums Category:Peggy Scott-Adams albums
title: Help Yourself (Peggy Scott-Adams album)
